title: I AM A CHINESE STUDENT
body:
I have downloaded lol yesterday.But when i try to play,it need to update.Its process is too slow,can anyone help me?
ps:i can not speek or write English well,you can try to guess my reflection.

replies.body: You should be able to get a bit of a faster download by switching to a wired connection, but double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for anything you could update as well!
